metadata.dc:author: Valtueña Borque, Oscar
metadata.dc:description: The author, Medical Doctor and Master in Art History, dicusses the real existence of the so called by the Florentine MD Magherini Stendhal syndrome, first time published in 1980 to put out the sickness that some tourists in their Florentia visit suffered, because the big beauty they founded in the city, as the French writter Stendahl suffered two centuries ago.
metadata.dc:title: ¿Existe realmente el síndrome de Stendhal?
[Does Stendhal's syndrome exist really?].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales de la Real Academia Nacional de Medicina
